item.title: New Bug-Fix Releases Are Available for MPS – 2025.2.2, 2025.1.2, 2024.3.5, and 2024.1.6
item.description: We’ve released updates for multiple major MPS versions that fix several additional issues. Check out all the updates in each particular version below: MPS 2025.2.2 Download MPS 2025.2.2 here. See the full list of fixed issues here. MPS 2025.1.2 Download MPS 2025.1.2 here. See the full list of fixed issues here. MPS 2024.3.5 Download MPS […] Link to article: https://blog.jetbrains.com/mps/2026/01/new_bugfix_releases_mps-2025-2-2/
